transmog.config.disable_during_pvp_durat: Temporarily disable rendering transmogs for a set amount of time if you hit another player. Set to 0 to ignore PvP.
transmog.config.render.everywhere.toolti: 同时渲染世界和背包，物品在你的背包里会变化成你所选择的物品（隐藏的物品依然会在背包中显示为未幻化的物品）
transmog.config.render.in_world.tooltip: 仅在世界中渲染幻化，物品在背包会显示原样，仅在手持，装备，以及其他方式呈现在世界上
transmog.config.render.off.tooltip: 禁止世界或背包渲染幻化，仅保留背包里的幻化物品提示
transmog.config.tooltip.full.tooltip: Add the original tooltip of the appearance item that an item is transmogrified into to its tooltip. This is the default option.
transmog.config.tooltip.minimal.tooltip: Add the name of the appearance item that an item is transmogrified into to its tooltip.
transmog.config.tooltip.none.tooltip: Don't add any info about an item being transmogrified to its tooltip at all.
